Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Level Description: Proficient (shows most elements clearly and correctly)
CAN: The student can draw two people who need to communicate over a distance.
The student can include a device in the drawing that uses sound to send and receive messages, such as cans or cups connected by a string.
The student can show how the device they designed uses a string to help sounds travel between the two people, including making the string taut.
The student can use only the materials shown in the drawing to help solve the communication problem, likely showing the string and cups/cans in use.
The student can illustrate how the device helps communication over a distance, clearly connecting the two people with the string device.
CANNOT: The student may not fully explain in writing how using this device makes life easier, potentially providing a somewhat vague or incomplete explanation.
The student might not label all parts of the drawing, such as not specifying the material of the string or the exact function of each component, leading to minor gaps in understanding.
